value.title: DAX Fridays! #10: RANK/ TOPN with slicer
value.excerpt: In this video you will learn how to create a custom slicer that will rank your data based on the criteria that you specify, for example, Top 3, Top 5 and Top 10. value.title: DAX Fridays! #13: EARLIER

Link to pbix and excel file: https://curbal.com/blog/glossary/earlier-dax  EARLIER is mostly used in the context of calculated columns.  The performance of EARLIER might be slow because it theoretically, it might have to perform a number of operations
